GSD.description:
media: pvrusb2: fix memory leak in pvr_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.141 by commit bacb37bdc2a21c8f7fdc83dcc0dea2f4ca1341fb. For more details please see the references link.
